name: reasonus-faderport
description: Zone and Surface files for the Presonus Faderport

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run git:push
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run git:push
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run git:push
scripts.version:pre: npm version prerelease && npm run git:push
